name: Lava Race
description:
RANDOMLY GENERATED ARCADE PLATFORMER

~~~Controls / Basics~~~

  • The lava starts rising immediately so stay away from it.
    • [A/D]: Move left/right.
    • [Spacebar]: Jump.
  • Start by breaking tiles in your way to get away from the lava.
    • [Left Click]: Break tiles. Stone takes longer to break.
  • Some jumps too high? Place some vines.
    • [Right Click]: Right click to place as many vines as you want.
  • Once you place your vines get ready to climb them.
    • [Shift]: Hold this to grab onto vines you are nearby. Can be held preemptively.
    •  or [W]: Toggles to climb mode only if nearby a vine.
  • When you are on a vine you can ignore gravity.
    • [W/A/S/D]: Move in any direction while climbing.
  • Pro tips:
    • Try to break tiles/place vines ahead of where you are
      • This helps save time.
    • Jumping is faster than climbing vines.
      • The start of your jump is the fastest you will move.
      • Skilled players use combinations of both. 
  • Try jumping and grabbing onto the vines at the peak of your jump.
    • Cycle through this fast and you will be on top of the competition.
  • Get a lead on the lava while it is slow.
    • It starts out slow but speeds up when you reach specific heights.
  • Skilled players use combinations of both.
